name: Alice Q. Wong
body: # About ME My name is Alice Qing Wong. I am a professional software developer and hobbyist artist. When I am not programming or playing around with pictures. I like to jog. I am a devout anime/manga and Harry Potter series fan. # Software ### Bowls Bill splitting app for Android. Inspired by Splitwise's Plates. This was my first "learn Android" project. [![Get it on Google Play](http://valour.me/bowls/play.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.valour.bowls) [[source code](https://github.com/algobunny/Bowls)] [[project log](http://valourai.tumblr.com/tagged/AndroidDev)] ### Abstract Experiment Designer Re-envision of PyView to be more flexible and multi-platform support. [[UI source code](https://github.com/algobunny/aed-web)] [[SDK source code](https://github.com/algobunny/aedsdk)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
